abstract: The trade group for insurers files a legal brief on the health care law.
snippet: The trade group for insurers files a legal brief on the health care law.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)

lead_paragraph: The health insurance industry is urging the Supreme Court to decide as quickly as it can whether the federal health care law is, in fact, constitutional and to consider what other parts of the law should be struck down if the individual mandate does not pass muster.

headline.main: Insurers Weigh In on Health Care Law
